body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/
-->


**What happened**:

Failed to setup cluster via `local-up-cluster.sh` in master branch.

```
use 'kubectl --kubeconfig=/var/run/kubernetes/admin-kube-aggregator.kubeconfig' to use the aggregated API server
hack/local-up-cluster.sh: line 633: node_cidr_args[@]: unbound variable
Cleaning up...
hack/local-up-cluster.sh: line 339: wait_for: No record of process 9141
...
2019/03/31 19:46:32 [WARNING] This certificate lacks a "hosts" field. This makes it unsuitable for
websites. For more information see the Baseline Requirements for the Issuance and Management
of Publicly-Trusted Certificates, v.1.1.6, from the CA/Browser Forum (https://cabforum.org);
specifically, section 10.2.3 ("Information Requirements").
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh: line 562:  8653 Terminated              etcd --advertise-client-urls "${KUBE_INTEGRATION_ETCD_URL}" --data-dir "${ETCD_DIR}" --listen-client-urls "${KUBE_INTEGRATION_ETCD_URL}" --debug 2> "${ETCD_LOGFILE}" > /dev/null
The connection to the server localhost:6443 was refused - did you specify the right host or port?
Kube-dns addon successfully deployed.
hack/local-up-cluster.sh: line 782: cni_conf_dir_args[@]: unbound variable
Cleaning up...
```

Perhaps related with https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/75662.

@s-ito-ts @dims 

**What you expected to happen**:

Run `local-up-cluster.sh` without error.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

./hack/local-up-cluster.sh

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g: `cat /etc/os-release`):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.name: kind/bug

title: Failed to setup cluster via local-up-cluster.sh
